title: Men's Health
summary: Men's Health (MH), published by Hearst, is the world's largest men's magazine brand,[7] with 35 editions in 59 countries.[8] It is also the best-selling men's magazine on US newsstands.[5] Although originally started as a men's health magazine, it currently covers various men's lifestyle topics such as fitness, nutrition, fashion and sexuality. The magazine's website, MensHealth.com, averages over 118 million page views a month.[9] Menâ€™s Health is published in numerous countries and has employed well known journalists, such as Evgeny Kogan in the Russian edition.
